text: Malhar Thakar is an Indian actor who primarily works in the Gujarati film industry and theatre. == Biography == He studied at Navrang High School and Sheth C. N. Vidyalaya, Ahmedabad. After nine years in theatre, he eventually broke into film roles. His debut film as the lead role was Chhello Divas (2015) which was commercially successful. His Love Ni Bhavai (2017) achieved critical and commercial success and ran for more than 100 days in theatres. Golkeri (2020) was also declared hit. In 2018, Thakar started his own production house, Ticket Window Entertainment. In April 2020, he announced the establishment of an NGO to help people affected during the COVID-19 pandemic in India. ==Filmography == ===Television and web series=== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Network |- |2013 |Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah |Parag |Sony SAB |- |2019 |Do Not Disturb | |MX Player |} ===Gujarati films=== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2012 |Kevi Rite Jaish |A guy at visa office | |- |2015 |Chhello Divas |Vicky | |- |2016 |Thai Jashe! |Pranav Joshi | |- |2016 |Passport |Kabir | |- |2017 |Duniyadari |Meet Mehta | |- |2017 |Cash On Delivery |Siddharth | |- |2017 |Love Ni Bhavai |Sagar | |- |2018 |Mijaaj |Jay | |- |2018 |Vandha Vilas | |Guest role |- |2018 |Reva |Traveller |Guest role |- |2018 |Shu Thayu? |Manan | |- |2018 |Ventilator |Funeral manager |Cameo |- |2018 |Sharato Lagu |Satyavrat | |- |2018 |Midnights with Menka |Malhar Thakar | |- |2019 |Saheb |Malhar | |- |2020 |Golkeri |Sahil Sutariya | |- |2020 |Vickida No Varghodo | |Post-production |- |2020 |Sara Bhai | |Post-production |- |2020 |Dhuandhar | |Post-production |- |2020 |Kesariya | |Filming |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Living people Category:Male actors in Gujarati-language films Category:Gujarati theatre Category:Gujarati people Category:Male actors from Ahmedabad Category:Indian male stage actors Category:Indian male film actors Category:21st-century Indian male actors Category:1990 births
